channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Natural real algebraic maps of non-positive codimensions with prescribed images whose boundaries consist of non-singular real algebraic hypersurfaces satisfying transversality
item.description: arXiv:2303.10723v5 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We present new real algebraic maps of non-positive codimensions with prescribed images whose boundaries consist of explicit non-singular real algebraic hypersurfaces satisfying so-called "transversality". We also give explicit information on important real polynomials. This gives new construction of explicit real algebraic maps of non-positive codimensions with explicit information on images, preimages and important real polynomials. Thanks to celebrated theory of Nash and Tognoli, smooth closed manifolds are non-singular real algebraic manifolds and the zero sets of some real polynomial maps. In considerable cases, we can approximate smooth functions or more generally, maps, by real algebraic ones. It is in general difficult to have explicit examples. We have constructed some previously. We have ones of some new type with explicit information on global structures of the maps.
item.dc:creator: Naoki Kitazawa

item.title: A Motion Planning Algorithm in a Figure Eight Track
item.description: arXiv:2403.05570v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We design a motion planning algorithm to coordinate the movements of two robots along a figure eight track, in such a way that no collisions occur. We use a topological approach to robot motion planning that relates instabilities in motion planning algorithms to topological features of configuration spaces. The topological complexity of a configuration space is an invariant that measures the complexity of motion planning algorithms. We show that the topological complexity of our problem is 3 and construct an explicit algorithm with three continuous instructions.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: The PUMP Journal of Undergraduate Research, 6, 224-249 (2023). Retrieved from https://journals.calstate.edu/pump/article/view/3559
item.dc:creator: Cristian Jardon, Brian Sheppard, Veet Zaveri
